title: Programming and English
description: Programming and English classes in one place. All native English teachers.

title: English Immersion
description: All classes are taught in English. By learning something in English, it doesn't feel like studying. Tasks are designed for minimal English ability, so don't worry about your level.

title: Project-based curriculum
description: In programming classes, you will set your own goals, work toward them, and learn the tools needed to complete each task.

title: Children to Adults
description: The curriculum is structured according to age and level, so everyone from children to adults can attend.

title: Group and Private Lessons
description: You can choose to have fun lessons with your classmates in a group or intensive one-on-one learning.

title: Online Lessons
description: Both children and adults can choose private lessons in-person or online . Group lessons are held face-to-face at the school.

title: Simple Pricing
description: All prices include consumption tax. If you contact us by the day before, you can take makeup lessons within the same month. We accept cash, bank transfers and PayPay.

title: Learning Technology
description: Both the programming class and the English class use audio, video, and games to make learning fun. Even beginners can enjoy it.
